    • fadeAndCall

      public void fadeAndCall(Runnable inCallback, Runnable outCallback)
      Fades the UIActor in and out, with callbacks for when the fade in and fade out animations are complete.
      Parameters:
      inCallback - The callback to be executed when the fade in animation is complete.
      outCallback - The callback to be executed when the fade out animation is complete.
